title: MSSPScraper
description: A comprehensive data set of Matt & Shane's Secret Podcast YouTube channel, scraped using YouTube API.

transcripts.description: This table contains the transcripts of each video from Matt & Shane's Secret Podcast. Each row represents a unique video transcript, with columns for video ID, timestamp, and the transcript text.

video_links.description: This table contains the direct links to each video from Matt & Shane's Secret Podcast. Each row represents a unique video, with columns for video ID and the URL.

videos.description: This table contains metadata related to each video from Matt & Shane's Secret Podcast. Each row represents a unique video, with columns for video ID, title, description, duration, views, likes, dislikes, and comments.

transcripts.sql:
select t.id, vd.snippet_title, t.transcript
 from transcripts as t
 left join videos as vd on vd.id = t.id
transcripts.title: Transcripts

video_links.sql:
select vl.id, vd.snippet_title, vl.url
 from video_links as vl
 join videos as vd on vd.id = vl.id
video_links.title: Video Links
